languages.text: {n}Скоморох сгибается в издевательском поклоне, словно приглашая вас на танец.{/n} "Смерть не входит в мои планы. Скульптор, за дело!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Стены сотрясает тяжелый раскат грома, вспышкой молнии озаряя фальшивое лицо скомороха. В рядах противников раздается едкий смешок. Напрасно. Уже через мгновение ваша свита ощетинивается оружием. И раньше, чем успевает отреагировать стража губернатора, — вы начинаете бой.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The fool delivers a mocking bow, as if inviting you to dance.{/n} "Dying was not among my plans tonight. Sculptor, get to work!"
languages.original_text: {n}Скоморох сгибается в издевательском поклоне, словно приглашая вас на танец.{/n} "Смерть не входит в мои планы. Скульптор, за дело!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The jester delivers a mocking bow, as if inviting you to dance.{/n} "Dying was not in my plans tonight. Do what you must, sculptor!"
{n}The jester delivers a mocking bow, as if inviting you to dance.{/n} "Dying was not in my plans tonight. Do what you must, sculptor!"
{n}The fool delivers a mocking bow, as if inviting you to dance.{/n} "Dying was not among my plans tonight. Do what you must, sculptor!"
{n}The fool delivers a mocking bow, as if inviting you to dance.{/n} "Dying was not among my plans tonight. Do what you must, sculptor!"
{n}The fool delivers a mocking bow, as if inviting you to dance.{/n} "Dying was not among my plans tonight. Sculptor, get to work!"
{n}The fool delivers a mocking bow, as if inviting you to dance.{/n} "Dying was not among my plans tonight. Sculptor, get to work!"

languages.text: {n}小丑嘲弄地鞠了一躬，仿佛在邀请你翩翩起舞一样。{/n}“我今晚可没有死在这里的打算。雕刻师，开始工作吧！”
languages.original_text: {n}The fool delivers a mocking bow, as if inviting you to dance.{/n} "Dying was not among my plans tonight. Sculptor, get to work!"

traits.locale_text: {n}小丑嘲弄地鞠了一躬，仿佛在邀请你翩翩起舞一样。{/n}“我今晚可没有死在这里的打算。雕刻师，开始工作吧！”

languages.text: {n}道化はまるで踊りに誘うかのように、嘲るようなお辞儀をしてみせた。{/n}「今夜、死ぬなんて予定にはなかったんだがな。彫刻家よ、やれ！」
languages.original_text: {n}The fool delivers a mocking bow, as if inviting you to dance.{/n} "Dying was not among my plans tonight. Sculptor, get to work!"

traits.locale_text: {n}道化はまるで踊りに誘うかのように、嘲るようなお辞儀をしてみせた。{/n}「今夜、死ぬなんて予定にはなかったんだがな。彫刻家よ、やれ！」

languages.text: {n}El bufón te dedica una reverencia con sorna, como si te invitase a bailar.{/n} «No entraba en mis planes morir esta noche. ¡Escultor, manos a la obra!».
languages.original_text: {n}The fool delivers a mocking bow, as if inviting you to dance.{/n} "Dying was not among my plans tonight. Sculptor, get to work!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El bufón te dedica una reverencia con sorna, como si te invitase a bailar.{/n} «No entraba en mis planes morir esta noche. ¡Escultor, manos a la obra!».

languages.text: {n}Soytarı, sanki seni dansa davet eder gibi alaycı bir reveransta bulunuyor.{/n} "Bu geceki planlarım arasında ölmek yok. Heykeltıraş, işe koyul!"
languages.original_text: {n}The fool delivers a mocking bow, as if inviting you to dance.{/n} "Dying was not among my plans tonight. Sculptor, get to work!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Soytarı, sanki seni dansa davet eder gibi alaycı bir reveransta bulunuyor.{/n} "Bu geceki planlarım arasında ölmek yok. Heykeltıraş, işe koyul!"

languages.text: {n}Le bouffon esquisse une révérence moqueuse, comme pour vous inviter à danser.{/n} « Je n'ai aucunement l'intention de mourir ce soir. Sculpteur, au travail ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The fool delivers a mocking bow, as if inviting you to dance.{/n} "Dying was not among my plans tonight. Sculptor, get to work!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le bouffon esquisse une révérence moqueuse, comme pour vous inviter à danser.{/n} « Je n'ai aucunement l'intention de mourir ce soir. Sculpteur, au travail ! »

languages.text: {n}Der Narr verneigt sich spöttisch, als wolle er dich zu einem Tanz auffordern.{/n} "Ich hatte nicht vor, heute zu sterben. Skulpteur ... an die Arbeit!"
languages.original_text: {n}The fool delivers a mocking bow, as if inviting you to dance.{/n} "Dying was not among my plans tonight. Sculptor, get to work!"
